title: Person of Interest -  The Beginning
author: IGN
comment: Someone please upload a clip-compilation of these scenes from this episode. I love how they show each attempt to make the machine, getting so out of control! XD
NATHAN IS BACK YES. Can't wait
Do trophy wars again those were awsome
description: In this clip from the October 21st episode, a flashback shows Finch (Michael Emerson) looking to teach the Machine morality.
